Replace.Text: A club composed of geniuses who are glimpsed by the Broad Knowledge.
"Do not delay or accelerate death. The flowers of life will eventually fall."
I like to declare a friendly civilization and hate the civilization that declares war to it.
Ruan Mei likes to announce friendship
Ruan Mei hates you to condemn his friends
The extra disputes will be of no use to you and me.
The experiment is not over yet.
The experiment error is too large, I need to terminate it to remove the fallacy.
Scientific exchanges should not be bound by national boundaries.
The time has not come yet.
Let us each get what we need.
If Ruan Mei is still there, you will never be so arrogant. Maybe we are just materials that she used afterwards.
If Ruan Mei is still there, you will never be so arrogant. Maybe we are just materials that she used afterwards.
A moment of spiritual light of genius
Get 100% progress when triggering [ICON_TECHBOOSTED] and [ICON_CIVICBOOSTED], build any improvement trigger cultural bombs.

What is life, she is full of interest; what is life, she is lost in her interest. Countless lives were reorganized, split, and then reorganized in her hands, and finally turned into quicksand and fell from her fingertips. Where she walked, her life collapsed, and her life was worse than death; where she walked, she swept away the bleakness and everything was revealed. That's all her. If she reaches the end of her life, will she still remember the reason for her departure? She was indifferent and did not answer.

What is life, she is full of interest; what is life, she is lost in her interest. Countless lives were reorganized, split, and then reorganized in her hands, and finally turned into quicksand and fell from her fingertips. Where she walked, her life collapsed, and her life was worse than death; where she walked, she swept away the bleakness and everything was revealed. That's all her. If she reaches the end of her life, will she still remember the reason for her departure? She was indifferent and did not answer.

Melee and anti-cavalry units recover [ICON_DAMAGED] health (up to 100% of damage suffered) after being injured within the territory, but the base [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power is reduced to 1. The combat unit causes [ICON_UNDERSIEGE] damage increase when attacking units abroad, and the increase value is 30% of the remaining health. Purchase area allowed.
Melee and anti-cavalry units recover [ICON_DAMAGED] health (up to 100% of damage suffered) after being injured within the territory, but the base movement power is reduced to 1.
The combat unit causes [ICON_UNDERSIEGE] damage increase when attacking units abroad, and the increase value is 30% of the remaining health.
Walking in front of the reed

Area construction does not remove the landform and obtain the basic bonus provided by the topography and landform resources of the cell. The builder can actively consume 1 [ICON_CHARGES] labor force to "study" the resources in the city, and after "study", the current production progress of the city increased by 25%. Build areas outside life baking furnaces -33% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity.
The builder can actively consume 1 [ICON_CHARGES] labor force to "study" the resources in the city, and after "study", the current production progress of the city increased by 25%.

The research [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] actively consumed 1 [ICON_CHARGES] labor force "studyed" the resources in the city, and after "study", the current production progress in the city increased by 25%. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR:Red] Research will consume this resource [ENDCOLOR]
Neural imitation embroidery picture and walk in front of reed

Melee and anti-cavalry units recover [ICON_DAMAGED] health (up to 100% of damage suffered) after being injured within the territory, but the base [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power is reduced to 1. The combat unit causes [ICON_UNDERSIEGE] damage increase when attacking units abroad, and the increase value is 30% of the remaining health. Purchase area allowed. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Area construction does not remove the landform, and obtains the basic bonus provided by the topography and landform resources of the cell. The builder can actively consume 1 [ICON_CHARGES] labor force to "study" the resources in the city, and after "study", the current production progress of the city increased by 25%. Build areas outside life baking furnaces -33% [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity.

Replace the holy land and the construction cost is lower. After the construction is completed, each additional resource, strategic resource, and luxury resource in the city will add 1 to all cells in the city, and the effect will be superimposed up to 6 times. After the construction is completed, each unit trained will be obtained by random cells in the city to obtain a random bonus resource, strategic resource, and luxury resource. [NEWLINE] If this area is plundered, the movement of the plunder unit [ICON_MOVEMENT] is increased by 10 points and a level 1 [ICON_PROMOTION] is promoted. After being plundered, three [ICON_BARBARIAN] experimental subjects of the same type as the plundering unit were leaked in the city (or Manzhai) nearest civilization to which the plundering unit belongs. The experimental subject +10 [ICON_MOVEMENT] mobility and +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power.

The experimental subject +10 [ICON_MOVEMENT] mobility and +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power.
+10[ICON_MOVEMENT] temporary movement force after plundering the life baking oven and get a level 1 [ICON_PROMOTION] promotion.
Life Baking Furnace creates new resources: {1_ResourceName}.
Ruan Mei studied all {1_ResourceName} in the country and seemed to have discovered some pattern.
Explore the deepest questions of the universe
Explore the deepest questions of the universe

After completing the project, remove a random resource within the empire. The project triggers random [ICON_TECHBOOSTED] and [ICON_CIVICBOOSTED] to encourage each of them for every 3 resources removed, and all cells in the country will be output +1, removing all units of all players.
My name is Ruan Mei, please pay attention to the pause of the breath in the middle of the name.
If you want, our capital is a good time to enjoy flowers.
If you want, we can hold each other a routine afternoon tea after experimentation.
Of course, my dear, our people will be happy about it.
Sorry, Ruan Mei is experimenting, as her slice, I can't give you any promises.
I feel the smell of inspiration in you.
Very good, maybe I should invite you to the deserted land, my dear?
Well, I will find another way to do it.
Oh, wait, my experiment is over soon.
We asked them to visit the life baking oven and sent out public scientific research materials, hoping that your life science will go a step further.
Sorry, Ruan Mei is not here, I am just slicing, please interview her next time.
We sent a delegation. Although it is not a human, its wisdom is not inferior to humans.
Please don't bother me with my experiment.
It is not a wise choice to make others unhappy.
Good luck before you realize the status quo.
I will rule out everything that interferes with the experiment.
I hope we can go hand in hand.
The smell of rust is not conducive to my experiments. Can we make wars and cast iron and horses scatter in the south?
